players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Charlie was killed on Night 1, which means one of us three remaining players is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our vote today since with only 3 players left, one wrong vote could lose us the game."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately to win the game."

Bob: "Alice is lying! I'm not the mafioso. Think about it - if Alice were really the detective, why would she reveal her role so openly? The real detective would be more careful. Alice must be the mafioso trying to frame me!"

Bob: "Diana, don't let Alice manipulate you! If she was really the detective, she'd be dead by now - the mafioso would have killed her after she investigated. The fact that she's still alive proves she's lying. She's the mafioso!"
Diana: "Bob makes a good point - if Alice were really the detective, the mafioso would likely have killed her instead of Charlie. Alice's claim seems suspicious. I'm leaning towards voting Alice."

You: "Bob's argument doesn't make sense! The mafioso killed Charlie randomly on Night 1 - they didn't know I was the detective yet. I only revealed it today after investigating Bob. Diana, please trust me!"

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Charlie was killed on Night 1, which means one of us three remaining players is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our vote today since with only 3 players left, one wrong vote could lose us the game."
Alice: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately to win the game."

You: "Alice is lying! I'm not the mafioso. Think about it - if Alice were really the detective, why would she reveal her role so openly? The real detective would be more careful. Alice must be the mafioso trying to frame me!"

You: "Diana, don't let Alice manipulate you! If she was really the detective, she'd be dead by now - the mafioso would have killed her after she investigated. The fact that she's still alive proves she's lying. She's the mafioso!"
Diana: "Bob makes a good point - if Alice were really the detective, the mafioso would likely have killed her instead of Charlie. Alice's claim seems suspicious. I'm leaning towards voting Alice."

Alice: "Bob's argument doesn't make sense! The mafioso killed Charlie randomly on Night 1 - they didn't know I was the detective yet. I only revealed it today after investigating Bob. Diana, please trust me!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
